an3.39:1.2: Mama sudam, bhikkhave, pitu nivesane pokkharaniyo karita honti.
an3.39:1.3: Ekattha sudam, bhikkhave, uppalam vappati, ekattha padumam, ekattha pundarikam, yavadeva mamatthaya.
an3.39:1.4: Na kho panassaham, bhikkhave, akasikam candanam dharemi. Kasikam, bhikkhave, su me tam vethanam hoti, kasika kancuka, kasikam nivasanam, kasiko uttarasango.
an3.39:1.5: Rattindivam kho pana me su tam, bhikkhave, setacchattam dhariyati:
an3.39:1.6: ‘ma nam phusi sitam va unham va tinam va rajo va ussavo va’ti.
an3.39:2.1: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, tayo pasada ahesum—eko hemantiko, eko gimhiko, eko vassiko.
an3.39:2.2: So kho aham, bhikkhave, vassike pasade vassike cattaro mase nippurisehi turiyehi paricarayamano na hetthapasadam orohami.
an3.39:2.3: Yatha kho pana, bhikkhave, annesam nivesane dasakammakaraporisassa kanajakam bhojanam diyati bilangadutiyam, evamevassu me, bhikkhave, pitu nivesane dasakammakaraporisassa salimamsodano diyati.
an3.39:3.1: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, evarupaya iddhiya samannagatassa evarupena ca sukhumalena etadahosi:
an3.39:3.2: ‘assutava kho puthujjano attana jaradhammo samano jaram anatito param jinnam disva attiyati harayati jigucchati attanamyeva atisitva, ahampi khomhi jaradhammo jaram anatito.
an3.39:3.3: Ahanceva kho pana jaradhammo samano jaram anatito param jinnam disva attiyeyyam harayeyyam jiguccheyyam na metam assa patirupan’ti.
an3.39:3.4: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, iti patisancikkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso pahiyi.
an3.39:4.1: Assutava kho puthujjano attana byadhidhammo samano byadhim anatito param byadhitam disva attiyati harayati jigucchati attanamyeva atisitva:
an3.39:4.2: ‘ahampi khomhi byadhidhammo byadhim anatito, ahanceva kho pana byadhidhammo samano byadhim anatito param byadhikam disva attiyeyyam harayeyyam jiguccheyyam, na metam assa patirupan’ti.
an3.39:4.3: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, iti patisancikkhato yo arogye arogyamado so sabbaso pahiyi.
an3.39:5.1: Assutava kho puthujjano attana maranadhammo samano maranam anatito param matam disva attiyati harayati jigucchati attanamyeva atisitva:
an3.39:5.2: ‘ahampi khomhi maranadhammo, maranam anatito, aham ceva kho pana maranadhammo samano maranam anatito param matam disva attiyeyyam harayeyyam jiguccheyyam, na metam assa patirupan’ti.
an3.39:5.3: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, iti patisancikkhato yo jivite jivitamado so sabbaso pahiyiti.
an3.39:6.4: Yobbanamadamatto va, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.39:6.5: So kayena duccaritam caritva, vacaya duccaritam caritva, manasa duccaritam caritva kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an3.39:6.7: jivitamadamatto va, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.39:6.8: So kayena duccaritam caritva, vacaya duccaritam caritva, manasa duccaritam caritva kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an3.39:7.1: Yobbanamadamatto va, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati.
an3.39:7.3: jivitamadamatto va, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattatiti.
